title: How-To: Downgrading LogScale Collector from Version 1.8.1 to 1.7.x
description:
Provides steps and caveats for downgrading the LogScale Collector component from 1.8.1 to 1.7.x,
including configuration backup, package handling, and service restart.

examples.name: High-level downgrade sequence
examples.description: Stop collector, install older package, restore configuration, start collector.
examples.query:
systemctl stop logscale-collector
rpm -Uvh --oldpackage logscale-collector-1.7.x.rpm
systemctl start logscale-collector
